analysis.Summary: Vue 3 component that renders a single rent record as a styled card, showing status, total days, start/end dates, optional comment and an Edit button.
analysis.Purpose: To provide a reusable, self-contained UI block for displaying and editing individual rent entries in the Rents module.

Components.name: CardRent
Components.role: Primary Vue component defined in this file; encapsulates template, logic and styles for a rent card.

Functions.name: totalDays
Functions.description: Calculates the total number of days between rent.startDate and rent.endDate.

Functions.name: formatDate
Functions.description: Converts a date value into a localized date string.
Functions.parameters: date (String|Date) – the input date to format

analysis.Usage:
Import and register in a parent view or list component. Example:

import CardRent from '@/modules/rents/views/components/blocks/CardRent.vue';

<template>
  <CardRent :rent="rentItem" />
</template>
Notes: Uses the <script setup> SFC syntax introduced in Vue 3 for concise component declarations.
SCSS styles scoped via class selectors; follows simple BEM-like naming.
Relies on browser locale for date formatting – may need adjustment for consistent cross-locale behavior.
Does not emit events; navigation is handled internally via router push to an 'Edit Rent' named route.
